name: nl.jorislodewijks.oocsi.csharp
description: This is an C# port of the OOCSI library, which is a lightweight, low-latency, publish/subscribe messaging service for connecting interactive devices and media created by Mathias Funk at Eindhoven, Technical University of Eindhoven for the department of Industrial Design. This is a rough port of the original Java implementation which can be found at https://github.com/iddi/oocsi. This port was written by Joris Lodewijks, a student at the same university.
